data.name: plControl.Help
data.value: Select the type of control to use for displaying the links

data.name: ploptView.Help
data.value: If using a List Control, select the display direction

data.name: plInfo.Help
data.value: Select whether you want an optional (...) button that will show more info on the specific link

data.name: plInfo.Help
data.value: Select whether you want to display an icon to the left of each link

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About The Links Settings

The Links Module provides methods for displaying hyperlinks in a module. There are 3 Links Settings that controls the display and actions performed for a link within the module.

  • Control Type - refers to how a link is displayed, either in a list of hyperlinks, or a dropdown textbox.
    • List – allows for displaying links with the familiar hyperlink format. Using this method all of the modules links are displayed in the area where the module is placed.
    • Dropdown – this option is useful to minimize the area used by the module. All of the links appear in a user-defined order from a dropdown textbox.
  • List Display Format – When a Links module’s Control Type is set to List, this option controls how the links are displayed directionally within the area where the module is placed.
    • Vertical – links appear down the page
    • Horizontal – links appear across the page.
  • Display Info Link – Displays an ellipse (…) hyperlink that allows an optional brief text description of the link to display when a the ellipse is clicked.

data.name: plNoWrap.Help
data.value: If wrapping is disabled, the content area in which the links module resides will stretch to fit the link, otherwise the content areas width will be fixed.
